name: @aofl/router
description: AOFL Router is a simple client side router

scripts.build-ci: npm run clean && npm run tsc && cross-env NODE_ENV=production aofl build --debug --config .aofl.cjs
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run tsc && cross-env NODE_ENV=production aofl build --config .aofl.cjs
scripts.build:dev: npm run tsc && cross-env NODE_ENV=development aofl build --config .aofl.cjs

author: Arian Khosravi <arian.khosravi@aofl.com>
